item.title: Being inclusive, being me
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: üôã‚Äç Ô∏èAs International Women’s Day is celebrated worldwide, efforts are underway to recognize women’s representation across diverse fields. In India, the spirit of ‘Nari Shakti’ is alive as discussions focus on various schemes and initiatives. Increased enforcement is advocating for equal opportunities in underrepresented sectors. The promising shift towards inclusivity is shaping a future grounded in equity and equality. üë©‚Äçüíª Thoughtworks is synonymous with diversity and inclusion, a leading brand in this space.
